Motorola g35 5G (Midnight Black, 128 GB) (8 GB RAM)
Product Description: Meet the Motorola G35 5G (Midnight Black, 128 GB / 8 GB RAM) — a sleek and capable smartphone designed to elevate your everyday mobile experience. With its refined Midnight Black finish featuring a 3D PMMA back, it not only feels premium in hand but also sports a durable build with an IP52 water-repellent rating to protect against everyday splashes. Under the hood, it runs on the UNISOC T760 chipset paired with a generous 8 GB of RAM (plus 128 GB storage) to keep apps snappy and multitasking smooth. The 6.72-inch full-HD+ display delivers vibrant visuals and comes with a high refresh rate (up to 120 Hz) for smooth scrolling and gaming. Photography is solid, thanks to a 50 MP main rear camera alongside an 8 MP ultra-wide shooter, and a 16 MP front camera for clear selfies and video calls. Powering all this is a 5,000 mAh battery that keeps you going through your day, and supports fast charging (20 W) so you spend less time plugged in. In short, this Moto G35 5G strikes a smart balance of style, performance and value — perfect for users who want a dependable 5G handset without blowing their budget.

Product Name: Motorola g35 5G (Leaf Green, 128 GB) (8 GB RAM)
Product Description: The Motorola g35 5G (Leaf Green, 128 GB, 8 GB RAM) is a stylish and powerful smartphone designed to keep up with your modern lifestyle. With its sleek Leaf Green finish, it not only looks elegant but also feels comfortable in your hand. Powered by a robust 8 GB of RAM and 128 GB of internal storage, it ensures smooth multitasking and ample space for all your apps, photos, and media. The 5G connectivity lets you experience lightning-fast downloads, seamless streaming, and lag-free browsing. Its vivid 6.6-inch Full HD+ display with a fast refresh rate delivers crisp visuals and fluid performance, perfect for gaming or binge-watching your favorite shows. The triple rear camera setup captures stunning photos in any light, while the high-resolution front camera ensures you always look your best in selfies and video calls. Backed by a long-lasting battery with fast charging support, the Motorola g35 5G keeps you powered through the day without missing a beat. Running on clean and secure Android, it offers a bloatware-free experience with smart features for everyday convenience. Whether for work, entertainment, or staying connected, the Motorola g35 5G blends performance, style, and innovation into one dependable device.

Product Name: Motorola Edge 60 Stylus (Sea, 8+256)
Product Description: Unleash creativity and performance with the Motorola Edge 60 Stylus 5G in the stunning Pantone Gibraltar Sea finish — a perfect blend of elegance, power, and precision. Designed for productivity and expression, this device features a built-in stylus that lets you sketch, take notes, and navigate with pinpoint accuracy. Backed by 8GB of RAM and a spacious 256GB of storage, it delivers smooth multitasking and ample room for all your files, apps, and media. The immersive display offers vibrant colors and crisp detail, making everything from streaming to designing a visual delight. With blazing-fast 5G connectivity, you can download, stream, and share at top speed, wherever you are. The Pantone Gibraltar Sea color adds a premium, artistic flair, making it as stylish as it is functional. Packed with a high-resolution camera system, long-lasting battery life, and Motorola’s clean, intuitive software experience, the Edge 60 Stylus 5G is the ideal device for those who want the freedom to create, connect, and stand out — all in one sophisticated package.

Product Name: Motorola G06 Power (Pantone Laurel Oak, 4GB RAM, 64GB Storage)
Product Description: The Moto g06 Power in the stylish Pantone Laurel Oak color is a budget-friendly smartphone that delivers reliable performance and long-lasting battery life, perfect for everyday use. Powered by a power-efficient octa-core processor and equipped with 4 GB RAM, it handles daily tasks like browsing, social media, and video streaming with ease. The phone offers 64 GB of internal storage, expandable via microSD, giving you enough space for your apps, photos, and music. One of its standout features is the massive 5000 mAh battery, which can easily last a full day or more on a single charge—ideal for users who are always on the move. The device features a large HD+ display, making your content look clear and vibrant whether you're watching videos or scrolling through your feed. On the back, it sports a dual-camera setup for capturing decent photos in good lighting, while the front camera takes care of your selfies and video calls. Running on a clean, near-stock Android experience, the Moto g06 Power keeps things simple and user-friendly, without unnecessary bloatware. With thoughtful additions like a fingerprint sensor for secure unlocking and a sleek design that feels good in hand, it offers great value for anyone looking for a dependable smartphone on a budget.
